Reviews.Title: good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: A. Haase "extreme.auto"
Reviews.Content: i bought 2 of these camera's and both work well but do not give a very wide picture easy to mount and can be mounted to hang from the top or the bottom(witch makes mounting in them hard place's easy.. as far as being water proof we shall see but i paid less than $65.00 and got x2 camera's x2 100 foot cords and x2 a/c adapters

Reviews.Title: Read the product description carefully!
Reviews.Author: F. Peralta ";^)"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for wireless unit and this one looked like the other wireless devices, due to the black line at the back that looked like the antenna of other similar units.  The package did not include a power adapter... which was in the description... The mount does  not look outdoor worthy... the metal looks like it will rust pretty quickly.  Otherwise the unit looks OK...I don't have a 12 volt power adapter with the right connector on it, so will have to wait to test it's operation...

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision CMOS security camera
Build-in 36 infrared LEDs. 0 Lux IR LEDs on. Build-in 6.0mm Lens
NTSC signal system. 420 TVL. Power requires:12V DC 500mA or above (sold separately)
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application
Package included: 1 x bullet camera, 1 x camera bracket and 1 x security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Bullet Security Camera Outdoor Day Night Vision IR Infrared LED Home CCTV Surveillance with Free Security Warning Decal 1FY
